name: Python Pong (SocialSide)
description:
Hello, this is SocialSide. About

Over here is the code for a simple retro pong game, this is and local multiplayer game which is to be played by 2 people. It is extremely easy to play and is a  great time waster for you and a friend.

How to Play 

There are only 2 controls in the game --->

Player 1 - W to move the paddle up | S to move the paddle down

Player 2 - Up arrow to move the paddle up | Down arrows to move the paddle down.

How to run

Since this is a python file you will need to have python installed on your system, after that just run the file and the game will pop up in a new window. If you face any issues, put them in the comment section and we will address it.

Changes

As this is source code you can edit it on your system and change it however you want to.

SocialSide
